keyMoments.title: Bluejam Pirates Robbed by Ace and Sabo
keyMoments.description: Two members of the Bluejam Pirates carrying treasure are robbed by Ace, setting off the chain of events in the episode.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the Bluejam Pirates as a major presence in Gray Terminal and creates the conflict with Ace and Sabo.

keyMoments.title: Porchemy Searches for Thieves
keyMoments.description: Porchemy, a member of the Bluejam Pirates, actively searches for those who stole from the crew.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's determination to recover stolen goods and punish thieves.

keyMoments.title: Porchemy Tortures for Information
keyMoments.description: Porchemy brutally tortures young Luffy to extract information about the stolen treasure.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the violent and ruthless nature of the Bluejam Pirates.

goals: Operating criminal activities in Gray Terminal

significantBattles.description: Porchemy is defeated by Ace and Sabo when they rescue Luffy.

trivia: The Bluejam Pirates use Gray Terminal as their base of operations, taking advantage of the lawless environment.
Porchemy was later executed by Captain Bluejam for losing to children (Ace and Sabo).
